SE450: Adding Components [22/41]

  • Construct components
    JButton helloButton = new JButton("Say Hello");
  • Set frame layout
    frame.setLayout(new FlowLayout());
  • Add components to frame
    frame.add(helloButton);

file:horstmann/ch04_frame/FrameTester.java [source] [doc-public] [doc-private]
00001: package horstmann.ch04_frame;
00002: import java.awt.*;
00003: import javax.swing.*;
00004: 
00005: public class FrameTester
00006: {
00007:    public static void main(String[] args)
00008:    {
00009:       JFrame frame = new JFrame();
00010: 
00011:       JButton helloButton = new JButton("Say Hello");
00012:       JButton goodbyeButton = new JButton("Say Goodbye");
00013: 
00014:       final int FIELD_WIDTH = 20;
00015:       JTextField textField = new JTextField(FIELD_WIDTH);
00016:       textField.setText("Click a button!");
00017: 
00018:       frame.setLayout(new FlowLayout());
00019: 
00020:       frame.add(helloButton);
00021:       frame.add(goodbyeButton);
00022:       frame.add(textField);
00023: 
00024:       frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
00025:       frame.pack();
00026:       frame.setVisible(true);
00027:    }
00028: }
00029:
